modName: Grimoas Plantigrade Feet  New Colors and feet tattoos
summary: Just a simple photoshop DDS file recolor
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][font=Times New Roman][size=5]HELLO![/size][/font][/u][/b]

I really do like grimoas feet but i use the khajiit CBBE texture  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62193/?
It's just a simple color changing in photoshop. I only did for you Light Blue, Dark Blue And Green. BUT don't lose hope. If you want another color you just need any photoshop and the dds plugin for it. They you only have to change the colors in a very easy way. You can post requests maybie sometimes when i will have some time i will make it for ya.

[size=4]REMEMBER
[/size]It's for female only. I mean.. not only you can change the gri_khajiit_f to M to make it for male but it's only about the textures. It's for you to edit :)
author: Me
